message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the value. However, I can't go lower than $11,000.  I believe this price is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be within my budget.
